name: Kingpin
description:
Play as Kingpin, a kingpin of crime whose hands are chopped off and replaced with... bowling balls?!? Punch and pound your way through bowling pins to rescue your captured henchman!

Created for SEA Game Jam 2021 by a team of 4.

Credits:
Jun Hun Wee - Gameplay and AI Programmer
Nicholas Tung - Gameplay and Physics Programmer
Tan Jia Hui - Artist and Video Editor
Cheong Yi Siang - Designer and Audio Mixer
